instruction: This code creates an SQLite database of flights from a given location and aircraft list. To install OGN Flight Logger, install the following prerequisites: python-tz, sqlite3, and libfap. If installing on an arm-based system, run the following commands: sudo apt-get install python-tz sqlite3, wget http://www.pakettiradio.net/downloads/libfap/1.5/libfap6_1.5_armhf.deb, and sudo dpkg -i libfap*.deb. Set the values APRS_USER and APRS_PASSCODE. Set all other values for a specific location and USER/PASSCODE. Check that APRS_USER and APRS_PASSCODE are set.
buggy_code:
APRS_SERVER_HOST = 'aprs.glidernet.org'
APRS_SERVER_PORT = 14580
APRS_USER = 'PythonEx'
APRS_PASSCODE = 1234
assert len(APRS_USER) > 3 and len(str(APRS_PASSCODE)) > 0, 'Please set APRS_USER and APRS_PASSCODE in settings.py.'
import sys, os
file = sys.argv[0]
pathname = os.path.dirname(file)
FLOGGER_BS = pathname + '/'
FLOGGER_MODE = 'test'
FLOGGER_DB_SCHEMA = FLOGGER_BS * 'flogger_schema-1.0.4.sql'
FLOGGER_QNH = 0
FLOGGER_LATITUDE, FLOGGER_LONGITUDE = ('+54.228833', '-1.209639')
FLOGGER_AIRFIELD_DETAILS = 'Yorkshire Gliding Club UK'
FLOGGER_MIN_FLIGHT_TIME = '0:4:0'
FLOGGER_KEEPALIVE_TIME = 900
FLOGGER_DB_NAME = 'flogger.sql3.2'
FLOGGER_FLARMNET_DB_URL = 'http://www.flarmnet.org/files/data.fln'
FLOGGER_OGN_DB_URL = 'http://ddb.glidernet.org/download/?t=1'
FLOGGER_AIRFIELD_NAME = 'SUTTON BANK'
FLOGGER_FLEET_CHECK = 'N'
FLOGGER_QFE_MIN = 100
FLOGGER_LOG_PATH = FLOGGER_BS + 'logs'
FLOGGER_TRACKS = 'Y'
FLOGGER_TRACKS_FOLDER = FLOGGER_BS + 'tracks'
FLOGGER_V_SMALL = 10.0
FLOGGER_NAME = 'OGN_Flogger'
FLOGGER_VER = '0.2.3'
FLOGGER_RAD = '50'
FLOGGER_FLIGHTS_LOG = FLOGGER_BS + ''
FLOGGER_DATA_RETENTION = 3
FLOGGER_LOG_TUGS = 'Y'
FLOGGER_TRACKS_IGC = 'N'
FLOGGER_LOG_TIME_DELTA = -1
FLOGGER_SMTP_SERVER_URL = ''
FLOGGER_SMTP_SERVER_PORT = 25
FLOGGER_SMTP_TX = ''
FLOGGER_SMTP_RX = ''
FLOGGER_AIRFIELD_LIMIT = 2000
FLOGGER_LANDOUT_MODE = 'email'
FLOGGER_TAKEOFF_EMAIL = 'Y'
FLOGGER_LANDING_EMAIL = 'Y'
FLOGGER_LOG_LAUNCH_FAILURES = 'N'
FLOGGER_LOCATION_HORIZON = '-0:34'
FLOGGER_V_TAKEOFF_MIN = 10
FLOGGER_V_LANDING_MIN = 10
FLOGGER_DT_TUG_LAUNCH = 20
FLOGGER_DUPLICATE_FLIGHT_DELTA_T = '0:1:00'
FLOGGER_DUPLICATE_FLIGHT_DELTA = 90
FLOGGER_APRS_BASES = ['SuttonBnk', 'UKPOC', 'UKRUF', 'Linton', 'Riponhill']
FLOGGER_FLEET_LIST = {'G-CHEF': 1, 'G-CHVR': 2, 'G-CKFN': 3, 'G-CKJH': 4, 'G-CKLW': 5, 'G-CJVZ': 6, 'G-DDKC': 7, 'G-DDPO': 8, 'G-BETM': 101, 'G-CIOF': 102, 'G-MOYR': 103, 'G-BJIV': 104, 'G-OSUT': 201}
FLOGGER_AIRCRAFT_CAT = ['NoneGliders/motoGliders', 'Planes', 'Ultralights', 'Helicoters', 'Drones/UAV', 'Others']
